Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '9.524 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches; 9.77 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890955'}
Review Text: I used the darker cat's eye recently on a family member's hands, she loved it. A base, 2 thin coats, and a topcoat. UV light and was perfect. The bottles are small and come in 6 colors.  I think it would be good for the girl that has a kit already started or a shop. Great stocking stuffer. Oh, I didn't pick up on the "light" pine scent.  I'd order again.
Review Title: beautiful colors

reference_summary:
Beuaty Star 3PCS Poly Nail Gel Kit 30ml, Extension Gel Trial Kit Nail Enhancement Builder Gel Professional Nail Gel All-in One with with Base Top Coat
Beauty Star
{'Brand': 'Beauty Star', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Unit Count': '144.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '10.7 x 9.2 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
The product took a bit of extra time to finally get to me. In general, together is a good set.  A couple of things annoyed me. First, the nails - the poly forms, were fine but the case they're in not numbered and the nail themselves are numbered but so tiny it's very hard to make out. Also, the container be VERY careful it doesn't close well if dropped with the way their numbered it was hard to put them back in their home slots. The poly gel- very very tacky, I get it supposed to be but it made it a bit messy from the tube to the spatula, to the nail. The company did warm about the gel in the turn and working with it in cooler temperatures.  In the few kits I've received from the Vine program it was the only one with a tool/brush so yay!! overall a good product and kit to use.
good for beginners

I used the darker cat's eye recently on a family member's hands, she loved it. A base, 2 thin coats, and a topcoat. UV light and was perfect. The bottles are small and come in 6 colors.  I think it would be good for the girl that has a kit already started or a shop. Great stocking stuffer. Oh, I didn't pick up on the "light" pine scent.  I'd order again.

profile:
### Updated User Profile Summary

**Keywords:** Nail Enhancement, Gel Products, Beginner Friendly, Product Usability, Delivery Delays, Attention to Detail, Color Variety, Scent Sensitivity

**Preferences & Trends:**
- **Nail Care Focus:** The user continues to show a strong interest in gel-based nail enhancement products, suggesting an appreciation for both creativity and practicality in DIY nail care.
- **Beginner Orientation:** They favor beginner-friendly options, indicating a preference for products that are easy to use and suitable for those who may not have extensive experience.
- **Attention to Detail:** Past concerns regarding packaging and usability remain, with an emphasis on well-organized designs that enhance the overall experience.
- **Delivery Experience:** The user values prompt and reliable delivery, as indicated by previous interactions.
- **Color Preferences:** Their recent interaction highlights a preference for a variety of colors, particularly those that can enhance overall manicures, suggesting an interest in trying different styles and effects.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** A noted reaction to a subtle scent indicates that the user is conscious of product fragrances, appreciating non-overpowering attributes.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Despite minor issues, the user maintains a positive attitude towards their purchases, enjoying both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

This profile illustrates a user who is engaged in the nail care community, seeking enjoyable, reliable, and aesthetically pleasing products to enhance their DIY manicure experience.
